item.title: wie man ein Diagramm erstellt
item.description: Diagram Types Flowchart graph TD; A–>B; A–>C; B–>D; C–>D; Sequence diagram sequenceDiagram participant Alice participant Bob Alice-»John: Hello John, how are you? loop Healthcheck John-»John: Fight against hypochondria end Note right of John: Rational thoughts prevail! John–»Alice: Great! John-»Bob: How about you? Bob–»John: Jolly good! Sequence diagram Gantt diagram gantt dateFormat YYYY-MM-DD title Adding GANTT diagram to mermaid excludes weekdays 2014-01-10 section A section Completed task :done, des1, 2014-01-06,2014-01-08 Active task :active, des2, 2014-01-09, 3d Future task : des3, after des2, 5d Future task2 : des4, after des3, 5d Gantt diagram
